1.content:
They called you crazy. Mocked you. Said you were a freak, a weirdo, among many other less than pleasant things. Your colleagues and your old flames, they all said you were one thing or another, none of them flattering. Well, here you were in your garage, your creation laid out on a table before you, about to prove them all wrong. At the moment, it is a blank slate, with no discernable features whatsoever. It is humanoid in shape, but has no marks, sexual features or even hair. That would change soon enough, but first you had to give it life, in a manner of speaking.

For months, you have been preparing for this moment. Now, at last, you have created the perfect woman, a robotic construct with a shape shifting, nanite-based synthetic skin that could take on the form of anything you, her creator wished. Once it had done so, it would feel exactly like real flesh, indistinguishable from a true organic being. Now, the moment of truth has arrived!

You plug the electrical generator into the socket in the back of your creation's head, linking it to it's artificial brain. With baited breath, you switch the generator on, and a loud electric hum fills the air. At last, your creation opens it's eyes for the first time! Switching off the generator, you rush over to see the fruits of your labor at work. The droid stares at you for a brief moment, before speaking it's first words.

"Hello, Master."

It worked! You hold out your hand and help it to sit up. Unplugging the generator from it's skull socket, you say "Do you know who I am?" The droid nods. "You are the love of my life!" "And what are your prime directives?" "To protect you, love you, and satisfy your every desire." Perfect, you think. Everything went off without a hitch! Unknown to you, within your creation's cybernetic brain lies a slight malfunction. This will cause it to take it's duties EXTREMELY seriously. But you're too excited at the moment to even think of any possible flaws that might have occurred.

You help your creation onto it's feet. "Master, you haven't given me a name." You smile "Don't worry, my dear. You shall have your name when I have selected your final form." You walk across the room to a pile of pictures you have stashed on a nearby table. These are images you printed off the internet of various fictional characters and celebrities. You shuffle through them, trying to decide which one would be perfect for your ideal girlfriend. Finally, after several minutes, you make your decision. You show the droid your chosen image. "I wish you turn change your appearance to this."

"As you wish, Master."

Your creation's nanite skin begins to shift and bubble as it changes to the exact image in the picture. Just what exactly is your Droid becoming?
1.title: It's Alive!

115312111.content:
"Alica? is that you?"

         " Surprise!" she smiled as her curly hair bounced
 
         " Alica! What brings you here? I haven't seen you in several years."
 
         Alica was a childhood friend of yours , that lived several houses down in your old neighborhood. You looked at her  " Dang, she looks like a goddess."  You used to have a crush on Alica. You looked at her outfit, which is gray dress, with tons of yellow birds on it. The dress was pretty short, that it ends above her knees. You looked at her smile, freckles, and red hair that you fell in love with several years ago.
 
         "Well, I kinda was in town, and I asked your parents where you lived."
 
         You sighed and wished that they would tell you this things  " That sounds like my parents."
You notice that she started to fidget, and look disinterested. So you decided to invite her in.
 
         " Ah, come in. Welcome to my humble abode."
 
         You opened the door to let her. She looked around your small apartment. Your embarrassed because of the papers and machine parts littering the floor. She stepped over a stack of papers.
 
         "Nice place, if it wasn't for all the papers."
 
         " Yeah, My boss has been making me, take my work home, last couple of days."
 
         " So where do you work?" She said in a singsong voice.
 
         " Houston robotics."
 
         She suddenly turned around." Wait isn't Houston the company who is created the holo pad 8?"
 
         " Yeah.
 
         " Is it true?"
 
         "Is what true." You asked confusedly
 
         "Their is a rumor that their working on creating the world first sentient AI."
You went silent, you do know that they have attempted to create very advanced robotic companion with human emotions. t Sadly it failed, but they did come close. You could ask it any question , and it can answer it. Alica noticed that you went silent, and turned around.
 
         "So its true."
 
         "Yeah." You even used a chip with the program, to use it in your latest personal project." WAIT a minute. oh Shit! " you thought" You forgot all about your robotic creation. "
 
         You quickly glanced at your bedroom door, and acting as casually as you can you make your way over their. Your about the close the door when Alica asked." What is that?"
 
What is Alica talking about?
115312111.title: Alica your childhood freind

1153121111.content:
You looked over relieved that she wasn't talking about Android. Except she was talking about the work table instead. But you can spin this, in a convincing way. You closed your bedroom door, and walked over to your work table.
 
"You see Alica, I am working a personnel project, that can change the world forever."
 
Alica rolled her eyes"That's what they all say."
 
"Oh, believe me, this will definitely change the world ."
 
"Really, then what is it?"
 
" I can't tell you that, whats the fun in that?"
 
"Oh right?" She rolled her eyes again.
 
You let out a sigh" Okay, how about this. I will tell you more about it, if let me take you out for a date."
 
         "Deal." She said
 
         "How about tomorrow at 5:00?"
 
         "Okay, text me then ." she said
 
         You said your goodbyes, and she left. You took a long sigh. You were excited you haven't been on a date in a while. You turned to get dressed because it was about time to work, and The droid was right their standing rigid. You look up and down forgetting that it was naked.
         "Who was that master?." she asked
 
         "Oh that Alica, she's a friend of mine." You proceed to walk past your droid, and got ready for work. You tightened your tie in the mirror and you can see it right behind you looking at you.
 
         " What do you want now?"
 
         " A name master." It replied
 
         " Oh right I will name you_____"
 
What do you name her?
1153121111.title: The table where you created the robot.

11531211111.title: Isabella

115312111112.content:
"Your name will be Isabella."
 
         Isabella's face lit up." Isabella, I like that name. Thank you master"
 
         "Yeah, yeah." You said dismissively" Now, I order you to stay here don't let the door open for anybody, and don't leave this apartment. Got it?"
 
" Yes Master."
 
         You walked out the door, and went to work. It was super easy to find where you work, it was the humongous tower in the middle of the square. You went up the elevator and sat at your desk started coding away. After coding several minutes, you felt a piercing presence behind him. As you looks behind it is Kim your manager. Kim is one of your ex-lovers, every since you guys broke up, she has been making your work life hell. Even thought her green eyes are staring at you with disgust, she still was looking nice today. Her hair was nicely done in a bun, thought she was wearing usual her secretary style outfit.
 
         "Oh, hi Kim. Looking like nice today."
 
         Kim just scoffed, as she put another pile of papers and left. You sighed as you blitzed through the paperwork, and continued to code on your computer. After several hour, you went on break to the buildings cafeteria, and sat with his usual gang. You sit with, Jim from accounting, Tyler(who is right underneath the boss), and Karl(fellow coworker). You and your friends talked about ya'll weekends, and stuff that you are all doing. You were going to tell them about"Isabella", but decided against it, but you did tell them that Alica came to town, and you asked her on the date. Your friends congratulated you.
"Good job man, I didn't believe you could actually do it!"
 
         "Wow, thank for believing in me guys."
 
After chuckling for a little bit, your lunch break ended and you went back to work. After finishing all of your work, you exited the building.
 
Where are you going now?

info.brief_description: You have built the perfect girlfriend for yourself! Maybe a little too perfect...
info.description:
You are a brilliant but socially awkward robotics engineer. Despite your vast knowledge and your best attempts at dating, you've only had a small handful of dates in your life, and they all have ended in failure. Mostly because your dates thought you were "too weird" or "A freak", and those were the most polite responses you've gotten. Then, one day, you get a genius idea! If you can't find a woman who will love you for who you are, why not make one instead? For months you've been gathering the necessary materials, designing programs, and drafting blueprints. Now, you're finally ready to activate your lover! You've also equipped her with a sort of nanite-based synthetic skin, which can change appearance to take any form you wish. Unfortunately, in your excitement and haste, unbeknownst to you, you have overlooked a small but critical glitch in your creation's programming. Upon activation, she seems to be a bit possessive and overly protective of you. You put it out of your mind for now, and enjoy your creation. But will this story be a romantic dream come true...or a nightmare?

Rules

1. Because of your creation's shape shifting skin, you will be able to choose her appearance. This may be of a fictional character, a celebrity, etc. Feel free to add your own choices for potential date appearances.

2. Once you have selected an appearance, please stick with it. No changing looks in the middle of the story.

3. Unless you're just adding more options, all chapter are to be a minimum of 3 to 5 paragraphs.

Enjoy!
